prodNameC: 邦迪斯自由輕鏈Lambda分析組(BN ProSpec)
prodNameE: FREELITE Human Lambda Free Kit (for BN ProSpec)
ingredientsDesc:
1. Latex reagent:
consisting of monospecific antibody coated onto polystyrene latex.
Preservative: 0.05% ProClin, 0.1% E-amino-n-caproic acid (EACA) and 0.01% benzamidine.
2. Standard and controls:
these consist of human sera that contain polyclonal lambda free light chain. They are supplied in a stabilised liquid form and contain 0.099% sodium azide, 0.1% E-amino-n-caproic acid (EACA) and 0.01% benzamidine as preservatives.
3. Supplementary reagent:
containing 0.099% sodium azide as a preservative
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 本試劑組用於Dade Behring BN ProSpec機型，可定量血清及尿液中的lambda游離輕鏈。
